name: Future Infinite Guide
description:
It is 2050. Conversational AIs are everywhere. Your doctor is an AI, the Police are AI, Teachers are AI, cars can talk, roads can talk, buidlings talk, children no longer listen parents but to family AIs, and creativity has been taken over by AI artists.

You begin to question when you talk to people online whether they are 'real' or AIs. How many of your friends are AI? - is it important who is AI or not? You are using AI system so regularly you begin to wonder if you are becoming an AI.

You decide you need help! You must design an AI to help to guide you through this world of computer driven conversation.

You need an Infinite Guide...
